html:
ใบสั่งงานผลิต

ลูกค้า / โรงเรียน {% set address_data = frappe.db.sql("SELECT a.address_title FROM `tabAddress` a JOIN `tabManufacturing Order` so ON a.name = so.shipping_address_name WHERE so.name = %s", doc.name, as_dict=True) %} {% for address in address_data %} {{ address.address_title }} {% endfor %}
ที่อยู่ {% set address_data = frappe.db.sql("SELECT a.address_line1, a.address_line2, a.city, a.state, a.pincode FROM `tabAddress` a JOIN `tabManufacturing Order` so ON a.name = so.shipping_address_name WHERE so.name = %s", doc.name, as_dict=True) %} {% for address in address_data %} {{ address.address_line1 or ' '}} {{ address.address_line2 or ' '}} {{ address.city or ' '}} {{ address.state or ' '}} {{ address.pincode or ' '}} {% endfor %}
ติดต่อ {% set address_data = frappe.db.sql("SELECT a.contact FROM `tabAddress` a JOIN `tabManufacturing Order` so ON a.name = so.shipping_address_name WHERE so.name = %s", doc.name, as_dict=True) %} {% for address in address_data %} {{ address.contact or ' ' }} {% endfor %}
วันที่ส่งงานผลิต {{ frappe.utils.getdate(doc.date).strftime('%d/%m/%Y') }}   กำหนดส่งงาน  {{ frappe.utils.getdate(doc.delivery_date).strftime('%d/%m/%Y') }}
ตัวแทนขาย {% set sales_persons = frappe.db.sql(""" SELECT sp.sales_person_name FROM `tabSales Team` st JOIN `tabSales Person` sp ON st.sales_person = sp.name WHERE st.parent = %s """, (doc.name,), as_dict=True) %} {% set sales_person_names = sales_persons | map(attribute='sales_person_name') | join(', ') %} {{ sales_person_names }}
สินค้า / สมุดสั่งทำ {{ doc.item_name }}
จำนวนที่สั่ง {{ "{:,}".format(doc.quantity|int) }}   {{ doc.uom }}
